text:
134
TAMIL NADU GOVERNMENT GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY
MEMORANDUM REGARDING DELEGATED LEGISLATION
Clauses 1(4), 5, 6,8,11,12 (6), 17, 18, 21, 25, 26, 32,33,36, 40, 42, 45 (2), 51, 55, 61, and 62 of the Bill authorise the Government, the Board of Management and the Academic Council of the University to prescribe the manner and the method of giving effect to certain provisions of the proposed Act, when enacted and brought into operation, by issuing suitable notifications, orders, statutes or regulations, as the case may be.
2. The powers delegated are normal and not of an exceptional character.
K.A. JAYAPAL, Minister for Fisheries.
